metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the Banite wizard on the top level of the Fireworks House in the Lower City. He is the one making the Dead Man's switches for the Steelwatch Foundry.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the wizard on the top floor of the Fireworks House building in Lower City.

1.speaker: Tomboldt the Pallid
1.text: Smokepowder has a distinctive olfactory signature. The slightest variance is as detectable as a spark in the darkness.
1.context: NodeContext: Threatening (but also a little excited to do some killing)
